episodes.title: The Culty Beginnings of Yogi Tea
episodes.description:
I love Yogi Tea so I was surprised to learn about its origins with the problematic cult leader, Yogi Bhajan. Many suggest they are still affiliated with the cult 3HO, like the other company started and owned by Sikh Dharma Institute, Akal Security. However, I am unsure of the ownership details of East West Tea Company. Do you drink Yogi Tea?

Twitter/X & TikTok @ mistycubed | Pinterest @ mistythemaven

00:00 Intro
02:44 Who is Yogi Bhajan
05:48 Problematic Practices
08:23 Kundalini Yoga
09:16 "It's a cult"
11:28 Business Ventures
12:50 Closing Thoughts
